page.title: 18Types of housing in Laggan
page.content: There are 4 types of housing in the given area.1-Privately owned 2-Rented council homes 3-Tied houses 4-Croft houses.There are nine private houses-(2 bungalows 7 traditional stone).The 8 council houses were built 35 years ago when electricity came to the village.The tied houses accomodate the farm workers although both teacher and Doctor have tied homes too.In Balgowan (east of block) there are 6 crofts only 4 of which work their land. The rest are worked by nearby Cluny estate (Landlord to the crofters).Most homes in Laggan are granite buildings with wooden window frames,solid fuel stoves and modern sanitation.
